summary: Transitive dependency vulnerability in semver (CVE-2022-25883) detected in nyc test coverage package, causing a Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS) vulnerability. Issue was automatically closed when the vulnerable library was removed from the inventory.
userImpact: Users could be affected by a denial of service vulnerability in the test coverage tool if untrusted semver range data is processed.
rootCause: semver versions before 7.5.2 contain a Regular Expression Denial of Service vulnerability in the Range function when processing untrusted input.
proposedFix: Upgrade semver to version 7.5.2 or later.
resolutionDetails: Issue was automatically closed by Mend when the vulnerable library was removed from the project inventory or marked as ignored.
keyQuote: Versions of the package semver before 7.5.2 are vulnerable to Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS) via the function new Range
